description: The returning resident is self-isolating at home following a visit to the UK, the government says.
title: One new coronavirus case confirmed on Isle of Man
title_page: One new coronavirus case confirmed on Isle of Man - BBC News
maintext: Health Minister David Ashford said allowing the UK resident to return home before the end of their 14-day isolation period was a "rational and fair decision" as two negative tests "provided evidence the individual is no longer infectious".
